mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TABLE (USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_RANK, USER_ACTIVATION, USER_COUNT) VALUES (emp_seq.NEXTVAL, #{USER_ID}, #{USER_PW}, #{USER_NAME}, #{USER_RANK}, 'Y', 0)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_RANK, USER_ACTIVATION, USER_COUNT FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw} AND USER_ACTIVATION = 'Y'
SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_RANK, USER_ACTIVATION, USER_COUNT FROM USER_TABLE ORDER BY USER_NO ASC
SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.BOARD_NAME, p.POST_NO, p.POST_TITLE, p.POST_TIME FROM BOARD_TABLE b JOIN POST_TABLE p ON b.BOARD_ID = p.BOARD_ID WHERE p.POST_AUTHOR = #{userId} ORDER BY p.POST_TIME DESC
